p: The locomotor activity was significantly decreased in the aluminum chloride treated group when compared with the normal control group. Cardamom oil treatment at both selected dose levels significantly improved locomotor activity on day 21 and 42 ( p < 0.001) when compared with the disease control group indicating improvement in aluminum chloride induced impaired locomotion. The cardamom oil treatment showed comparable results as that of donepezil hydrochloride treated group ( Figure 1).
